# W0121-23JP05: Outdoor Fitness Shed with Fitness Equipment

## Tender Information
### Reference Number
W0121-23JP05
### Amendment Number
1
### Solicitation Number
WS3760985038
### Publication Date
2022-12-14
### Tender Closing Date
2023-01-10, 14:00:00 EST
### Amendment Date
2023-01-05
### Expected Contract Start Date
2023-01-26
### Expected Contract End Date
2023-02-20

## Tender Status
Expired

## Procurement Details
### Procurement Category
Goods and Services (GD)
### Procurement Method
Competitive – Open Bidding
### Notice Type
Request for Proposal (RFP)
### Selection Criteria
Lowest Price

## Contracting Entity
### Contracting Entity Name
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
### Contracting Entity Address
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada
### End User Entity
Department of National Defence (DND)

## Goods and Services
### GIN Description (English)
None
### UNSPSC Description (English)
Sports and health buildings and structures
### Goods and Services Description
The Department of National Defence (DND) requires the supply and delivery of an Outdoor Fitness Shed with suitable Fitness Equipment to be installed at 15 Wing, Moose Jaw. The Contractor must meet with the requirements outlined in the RFP document.

## Contact Information
### Contact Name
Oana Lee (SPAC/PSPC)
### Contact Email
oana.lee@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

## Important Notes
* AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by January 10, 2023 at 14:00 EST. All bids submitted after 14:00 EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. 
* Tenders qualifications and quantities will be highlighted in the respective report filed out by PSPC.

Please note, the text has been simplified the contractor's statements ignored for better readability. Details of trade agreements and regions of opportunity have been removed, as these are not relevant to those tenders.
